message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.DS

The paper discusses methods for reducing annotation cost in machine learning tasks, specifically in the context of probabilistic classification models. This falls under the broad category of machine learning (cs.LG) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The paper also mentions the use of these methods in part-of-speech tagging, which is a common task in natural language processing (cs.CL). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of committee-based methods, which are commonly used in machine learning (cs.AI) and computer vision (cs.CV). Finally, the paper describes empirical methods for sample selection, which is a common technique in data science (cs.DS).
